price: Dir-se-Ihes-á: "Eis a Geena que os criminosos desmentiam."
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
